title: Adaptive Mobile Language Learning Course Based on Learning Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of fundamental professional terminology
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment providing customized content to enhance professional workers' practical language proficiency

learning_goals: Learners can access language learning content in a way optimized for their learning style (visual/auditory/kinesthetic).
Learners acquire five core language skills per week through 10-minute microlearning modules in a mobile environment.
Learners achieve a 20% improvement in language proficiency scores in post-assessments compared to pre-assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
